synopsis.text: Whoever thought an ordinary orphan named Rai would be the chosen one? He's stunned to learn he's a secret descendant of the Tigeroids, an ancient race of peaceful beings engaged in a relentless battle against the cunning Dragonoids. In a parallel universe called Suhn, the Tigeroids and Dragonoids are locked in a fierce competition to recover 500 lost tai chi symbols, each possessing immense power. The race to retrieve these symbols could determine the fate of their realm and spell doom for their adversaries. As Rai sharpens his inherent tai chi card skills, he embarks on a thrilling journey to locate the lost symbols and become one of the legendary Tai Chi Chasers, ultimately fighting to protect his newfound heritage against the ruthless Dragonoids.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
